description: Causes heavy suffocation damage. Becomes even more lethal if the mob has more than 120 suffocation damage.

threshold.desc: Additionally synthesizes pancuronium and sodium thiopental inside the host
Doubles the damage done by the symptom

description: Causes rapid hair loss.

Causes the affected mob to burst into flames periodically, while also giving them small doses of Napalm and Chlorine Trifluoride. If wet when bursting into flames, the victims will also explode. Explosions can happen in stage 4 and stage 5.

threshold.desc: Doubles the intensity of the immolation effect, but reduces the frequency of all of this symptom's effects.
Increases explosion radius and explosion damage to the host when the host is wet.
Additionally synthesizes chlorine trifluoride and napalm inside the host. More chemicals are synthesized if the resistance 9 threshold has also been met.

description: Causes the mob's cells to decay rapidly, causing brute damage, constant bleeding and elevated hunger.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Synthesizes Heparin and Lipolicide inside the host, causing increased bleeding and hunger

description: Causes spikes of oxygen deprivation. Deals damage based on stage speed and stealth.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Increases choking frequency

description: The virus irritates the throat of the host, causing occasional coughing. Each cough will try to infect bystanders who are within 1 tile of the host with the virus.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
The host will drop small items when coughing.
Occasionally causes coughing fits that stun the host. The extra coughs do not spread the virus.
Increases cough frequency
Coughing will now infect bystanders up to 2 tiles away.

description: Makes the affected mob be confused for short periods of time, making them walk in random directions.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Causes brain damage over time
Increases confusion duration and strength

description: Causes intermittent loss of hearing.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Causes permanent deafness, instead of intermittent

description: Causes the host's face to crumble and cave in, disfiguring the host to appear as 'unknown' to others until cured.
Shakes the affected mob's screen.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Also causes druggy vision

description: The virus bonds with the DNA of the host, activating random dormant mutations within their DNA. When the virus is cured, the host's genetic alterations are undone.

threshold.desc: Only activates negative mutations in hosts.
The negative and mildly negative mutations caused by the virus are mutadone-proof (but will still be undone when the virus is cured if the resistance 14 threshold is not met).
The host's genetic alterations are not undone when the virus is cured.
The virus activates dormant mutations at a much faster rate.

description: Makes you never physically older than young adulthood and prevents death by old age. Should be used for buffing your disease.
Makes you grow a massive beard, regardless of gender.
Heats up your body. Will not reach damaging levels of heat unless resistance thresholds are met.

threshold.desc: Increases fever intensity, fever can overheat and harm the host
Further increases fever intensity

description: Makes the affected mob have hallucinations for short periods of time. Available in Virus Crates.

threshold.desc: The virus mimics positive symptoms
Increases the amount of hallucinations

description: Displays an annoying message! Should be used for buffing your disease.

threshold.desc: Reduces headache frequency until later stages
Headaches will cause severe pain, that weakens the host
Headaches become less frequent but far more intense, preventing any action from the host

description: The virus becomes able to affect inorganic species, such as Golems or Plasmamen.
Inflicts eye damage over time. Causes blindness if left unchecked.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Weakens extraocular muscles, eventually leading to complete detachment of the eyes

description: Displays an annoying message. Should be used for buffing your disease. Can do slight brute damage if the stage speed threshold is met.

threshold.desc: The host will scrath itself when itching, causing superficial damage
Increases frequency of itching

description: Doubles the host's metabolism speed, making them process chems much faster than normal, but also increasing their hunger tenfold.

threshold.desc: Reduces hunger rate
Chemical metabolization is tripled instead of doubled

description: The virus strengthens the bonds between neurons, reducing the duration of any ailment of the mind. Heals brain damage, and can cure mild and heavy traumas if upgraded.

threshold.desc: Heals minor brain traumas
Heals severe brain traumas
Purges alcohol in the bloodstream

description: The virus reacts to nanites in the host's bloodstream by enhancing their replication cycle.

threshold.desc: Increases the replication boost
Increases the virus' growth rate while nanites are present

description: Makes the host drowsy and prone to falling asleep randomly.

threshold.desc: Causes narcolepsy more often, increasing the chance of the host falling asleep
Causes the host to periodically emit a yawn that spreads the virus in a manner similar to that of a sneeze

description: The virus becomes able to affect corpses and undead races, instead of lying dormant.
Causes brute damage over time. Fatal if left untreated.

threshold.desc: Host will bleed profusely during necrosis
Also causes stamina damage (2x as much as the brute damage)

description: Heals brute and burn damage if the host is not currently exposed to light. Heals brute damage more quickly than burn damage.

threshold.desc: Doubles healing speed

description: The host absorbs plasma in the air and in their bloodstream, using it to stabilize their temperature and heal brute, burn, and toxin damage.

threshold.desc: Increases healing speed
Increases temperature adjustment rate

description: The virus replaces the melanin in the skin with reactive pigment, by adding random crayon powder to the host.
Heals brute, burn, and toxin damage while the host is irradiated. Higher radiation levels increase the healing speed.

threshold.desc: Increases healing speed
Additionally heals cellular damage

description: Causes the host to fall into a death-like coma when heavily damaged, then rapidly cures their wounds.

threshold.desc: Host appears to die when falling into a coma
The virus also stabilizes the host while they are in critical condition
Increases healing speed

description: Quickly heals oxygen damage, negating the need for air.

threshold.desc: Additionally regenerates lost blood

description: Restores mob's senses by fixing eye and ear damage.
Cools down your body. Won't reach damaging levels unless thresholds are met.

threshold.desc: Increases cooling speed; the host can fall below safe temperature levels
Further increases cooling speed

description: The virus reacts to nanites in the host's bloodstream by attacking and consuming them.

threshold.desc: Severely increases the rate at which the nanites are destroyed
Increases the virus' growth rate while nanites are present

description: The virus causes irritation of the nasal cavity, making the host sneeze occasionally. Sneezes from this symptom will spread the virus in a 4 meter cone in front of the host.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
The force of each sneeze catapults the host backwards, potentially stunning and lightly damaging them if they hit a wall or another person mid-flight
Increases sneezing range, spreading the virus over 6 meter cone instead of over a 4 meter cone

description: Sets your body on fire periodically.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Increases the intensity of the flames
Further increases flame intensity
Host will spread the virus through skin flakes when bursting into flame

description: Heals brute, burn, and toxin damage while exposed to starlight. Heals toxin more efficiently. Actually being in space intensifies the effect.

threshold.desc: Increases healing speed
Removes penalty for only being close to space

description: Heals brute and burn damage if the host drank water recently, or if they're wet. Heals burn damage more efficiently.

threshold.desc: Water is consumed at a much slower rate
Increases healing speed

description: Purges all chemicals at a fast rate from the bloodstream

threshold.desc: Increases chem removal speed
Consumed chemicals nourish the host

description: Massively buffs the evolutionary cycle of viruses, causing it to be faster acting, better at infecting, but more easily detected and cured.
Massively buffs the adaptation of viruses, causing it to be stealthier, harder to cure but slower acting.
Changes the voice of the affected mob. Causing confusion in communication. Available in Virus Crates.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Changes voice more often
The host's language center of the brain is damaged, leading to complete inability to speak or understand any language, until cured.

description: Forces the affected mob to vomit! Makes the affected mob lose nutrition and heal toxin damage.

threshold.desc: The symptom remains hidden until active
Host will vomit blood, causing internal damage
Host will projectile vomit, increasing vomiting range

description: The virus mutates the host's metabolism, making it almost unable to gain nutrition from food.

threshold.desc: The symptom is less noticeable
